Subject: Re: ENTER GROUNDED!!!
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider looks at Winlord try to leave, "Nuh unhhhh, that's not very
brave" he whispered, and then started to cackle very loudly. He swooped
downwards, spreading his legs, and he pulled out his Scatterblaster,
pulling the trigger three times, sending a barrage of laser fire towards
Winlord.
